issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

fields.summary: YARN unable to renew delegation token fetched via webhdfs due to incorrect service port

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body: It looks like the commit of HDFS-6904 missed adding a few new classes.  I've asked [~jnp] to take a look.  Thanks for reporting it, Zhijie.
Thanks to [~jnp] for fixing this so quicky in HDFS-6904.  I'm resolving this as duplicate.
